<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quill Spray](/Feats.aspx?ID=2840) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Shisk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=382" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 125 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Quillcoat Shisk](/Heritages.aspx?ID=180) heritage or quill [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack

</column>

---

You can launch a mass of quills at opponents. You spray quills in a 30-foot cone, dealing 5d8 piercing damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) saving throw against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. On a critical failure, a creature also takes 5 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). At 11th level and every even level thereafter, the piercing damage increases by 1d8 and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.
name: Quill Spray
prerequisite: Quillcoat Shisk heritage or quill unarmed attack
